Custom emoji JSON files from youtube channels

What's this?

Emoji JSON files scraped from youtube pages.

Why?

When using the youtube Livestream Chat API, there's no way to get the custom emoji images without resorting to scraping the youtube pages.

How to use

Make an HTTP request to /emojis/$CHANNEL_ID/$VIDEO_ID

Example /emojis/UCyl1z3jo3XHR1riLFKG5UAg/KIe916CW3pg

Notes

The initial request will be slow since it's scraping several youtube pages. Also, there won't be automatic updates for now if a youtube channel changes the emojis.
